original_title: Dialog Club Vision members enjoy exclusive screening of Ponniyin Selvan 2
original_body_lines: Dialog Club Vision members were in for a treat, as they got exclusive access to a special screening of the highly anticipated Ponniyin Selvan 2 blockbuster film at the Regal Silver – Jaffna movie theatre. As one of the most eagerly awaited movies of the year, Dialog Club Vision members and their loved ones were hosted to an exclusive screening, where the attendees enjoyed a first look at this cinematic masterpiece. The event was a huge success, with members raving about the stunning visuals, incredible performances, and engaging storyline of the movie. The screening was just one of the many benefits of being a Dialog Club Vision member, highlighting its commitment to providing its members with exclusive perks and unique experiences.
‘Port City Colombo SEZ project has attracted USD 1.3 billion FDI since inception’
